timelineItems.desc: The New York Red Bulls make their 2014 home debut against a team making its bow for the new season as the Colorado Rapids visit Red Bull Arena on Saturday afternoon.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: New York Red Bulls vs Colorado Rapids

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the center of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Wright-Phillips puts an Henry cross just wide early on

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls pouring it on offensively right now. Rapids with no response yet, will fall behind soon if this continues. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Olave takes issue with something Deshorn Brown said and nearly shoves him over. Alan Kelly talks to both players. #RBNY #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Train
timelineItems.text: It's a beautiful afternoon to kick off the home opener. God I missed this. #ckmf #gsu #gardenstateultras #esc #empiresupportersclub #va #vikingarmy #newyorkredbulls #rbny #redbullnewyork #mls #southward #ny96 #ultras #tifo

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: Jamison Olave is back. Announcing his presence to #Rapids96 Deshorn Brown. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Center backs Moor and Wynne have been saving graces so far- good from both so far. Need better from fullbacks to narrow width. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Burgundy Wave
timelineItems.text: Though the team is playing a bit rusty, it's very promising to see the defense standing up to early challenges. #Rapids96

timelineItems.desc: The New York Red Bulls make their 2014 home debut against a team making its bow for the new season as the Colorado Rapids visit Red Bull Arena.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: New York Red Bulls vs Colorado Rapids | March 15, 2014

timelineItems.comment: Bobby Convey (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Shane O'Neill (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: #RBNY have had more possession through 20 minutes, but #Rapids96 are getting more comfortable. Berner quick off his line to stop an attack.

timelineItems.name: Alex Ortega
timelineItems.text: Game day y'all #rbny

timelineItems.comment: Gabriel Torres (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Thor Morgan
timelineItems.text: Jose Mari has looked really strong so far. Good on the ball, nice vision #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Only four of #Rapids96 starters from last season (Moor, Wynne, Powers, Brown) were in lineup in last season’s opener.

timelineItems.comment: Richard Eckersley (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Chris Klute (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Rapids have settle in while #RBNY still trying to solve the puzzle of how to crack open the back line. Getting TH14 more involved would help

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Credit Berner -- great composure for the SuperDraft pick in the face of an #RBNY assault. #NYvCOL #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Sam, Wright-Phillips -- and yes, Eckersley -- all the offense going through #RBNY's right side #NYvCOL

timelineItems.name: erinvonkupfer
timelineItems.text: In Petke we trust. #rbny #runwithus

timelineItems.name: Matt Kremkau
timelineItems.text: Oh New York !!! #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Rachel
timelineItems.text: Henry! #runwithus #redbulls

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Really liking LaBrocca so far. Helping solidify midfield. #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls).
Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Great defensive pressure by both Henry and BWP today. Cahill surprisingly deep all game -- more so than McCarty. #RBNY #NYvCOL

timelineItems.name: Jacob Leander-Olsson
timelineItems.text: Årets första fotbollsmatch live #redbulls #rbny

timelineItems.comment: Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: MIGUEL GONZALEZ
timelineItems.text: #RBNY fans haven't stopped cheering all game @NewYorkRedBulls #COLvsNY #RunWithUs

timelineItems.name: Rick Quan
timelineItems.text: #redbull #newyorkredbull #nyrb

timelineItems.title: SAVE: Nick LaBrocca denied ambitious shot from distance

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Deshorn Brown has successfully (fearlessly?) gotten under the skin of Armando, Olave. A bit of intent on Spaniards foul. #RBNY #NYvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Dillon Powers.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Mintz
timelineItems.text: Home opener. #rbny

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner.

timelineItems.name: Allen Li
timelineItems.text: Watching Henry do work in the Red Bulls season opener #NYRB

timelineItems.name: Patrick O'Harra
timelineItems.text: Jose Mari & LaBrocca seem to be working well in tandem--each watching the other and positioning accordingly. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Burgundy Wave
timelineItems.text: The Red Bulls have like four guys clustering towards Powers every time he touches the ball #MyReputationPrecedesMe #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: José Mari (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: Brown has had two opportunities to send Torres on the left on the counter. Both missed. #RBNY #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Despite the slow opening 10-15, #Rapids96 clearly had better chances of both sides. Last 15-20 have been solid for COL.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Roy Miller tries a through ball, but Bradley Wright-Phillips is caught offside.
Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids).
Attempt missed. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Convey, who hasn't had a particularly strong outing so far, with a turnover that leads to a Rapids counter. Brown fires high, however. #RBNY

timelineItems.text: On the field #MLS #redbulls #nyrb #football #soccer

timelineItems.name: Burgundy Wave
timelineItems.text: Remember when I spent all of 2013 sighing about Labrocca being played horribly out of position? Now he's in position. #LookingGood #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Frank Giase
timelineItems.text: Good sign for Red Bulls after last week. Eckersley and Armando playing well in the back. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 weathered early storm of #RBNY attack. Now have a firm foot-hold in the game and creating the better of attacking opportunities.

timelineItems.name: Patrick MacDonald
timelineItems.text: Second week in a row where Lloyd Sam has been one of the more impressive #RBNY players

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is close, but misses the top left corner.

timelineItems.name: Ted
timelineItems.text: My spot for the whole season. Feels good man #rbny #COYRB

timelineItems.name: Patrick O'Harra
timelineItems.text: Klute & Torres look like they are still in preseason form. Nothing happening on the #Rapids96 left. Klute very shaky in first half.

timelineItems.text: Isn't Pickens still on our roster? Why not start the guy? #Rapids #Rapids96 #justsaying

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: rugg ruggedo
timelineItems.text: The back line is losing form constantly. Recovering better this week but still giving up opportunities. #RBNY Robles is keeping us in it

timelineItems.name: Steve Tranter
timelineItems.text: Fizzy Liquid Football #RBNY http://t.co/OUkleB5LSX

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: #RBNY have defended each corner, but look shaky doing so. An over-eager #Rapids96 strikers corps tripping over themselves. #Breathe #NYvCOL

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: Olave's lack of concentration could have cost #RBNY. He has to anticipate that header from Miller.

timelineItems.name: Rapids Extra Time
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 more aggressive the last part of the first half.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Jamison Olave.

First Half ends, New York Red Bulls 0, Colorado Rapids 0.

timelineItems.name: RBNYTweets (Matt)
timelineItems.text: Peguy needs to come on for the second half, #RBNY has a serious lack of creativity

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Riddile
timelineItems.text: Rapids have all the scoring opportunities in the first half. Not surprised by Powers, very impressed with Serna. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: HALFTIME: 0-0. Slow start, very half overall. Serna dangerous along the right, good CB play, LaBrocca unsung hero... #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Serna has forced Robles into a pair of saves. Homegrown Player doesn't need much space to find a shot. Looks good so far. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Another counterattack from #Rapids96 as Brown takes it 50 yards on his own, but he can't keep the shot down. 39th minute

timelineItems.name: Herman Quito
timelineItems.text: We making some awful decisions when we pass? Overall not a bad half let's get it in the second one with a win! #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Diego Moscoso Shareholders
timelineItems.text: Put me in coach ! #inside the away bench on the home field. #RBNY arena

timelineItems.name: rickyydayy
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls game. Supporters section. Hell yeah! #nyrb #soccer #hooligans #chanting

timelineItems.name: Andy Newbold
timelineItems.text: First match of the season. Colorado Rapids at New York Red Bulls.

timelineItems.name: Jay
timelineItems.text: With Sam's expanded play making role Cahill looks complacent. He needs to make 3 rd runs. The long shots on Robles trend continues. #rbny

timelineItems.name: Chris Hoenig
timelineItems.text: Eckersley had more good plays in the opening 8 mins than he had all last week. Henry moving like he's 27, not 37. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Ryan Haigh
timelineItems.text: #rbny home opener is off and running. Perfect weather for a W. I believe @s_bot @justinmonroe #vscocam

timelineItems.name: Eric Muller
timelineItems.text: Great to be back. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: How is that for a stat - four shots, zero on goal for #RBNY. Will it get better in the second? About to find out. #NYvCOL

timelineItems.name: Mike
timelineItems.text: @DanCovello I thought #RBNY passing in the first 10 minutes were entertaining. Colorado clamped down after that.

timelineItems.text: Damn It's Good To Be Back!

timelineItems.text: Petke doing his best to ignore the massive Supporters Shield TIFO in his honor. #MovingOn #RBNY #NYvCOL #MLS

timelineItems.text: This is awesome! #soccer #ny #redbulls #rbny #amazing #great #game #instagood #instadaily

timelineItems.text: Get Johnny Steele out there stat! #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Katina
timelineItems.text: GOAAAAAAAL YES HENRY!!!!! THAT WAS BEAUTIFUL #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: Henry Goal. Diving header and a great celebration. #RBNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: Shakespeare O'Shiße
timelineItems.text: That's a great celebration from Henry. Shame that MSG couldnt cut to that camera immediately.. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Unmarked Henry heads home in the 57th- #NYRB take the 1-0 lead.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Henry heads home @NewYorkRedBulls' first of the match. 1-0 over Colorado: http://t.co/P2CBi2W9BR #NYvCOL

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: GOAL RBNY! HENRY! Sam with a delicate cross, Cahill draws attention of both CBs (which fail to clear), Henry hits diving header. 1-0. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Riddile
timelineItems.text: Also, where was #Rapids96 DP Gabby Torres? Barely on the ball first half.

timelineItems.name: jose20milla
timelineItems.text: Nice day for a red bulls game! #nyrb #redbull

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. José Mari (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: soccersource
timelineItems.text: Lloyd Sam, who made that goal happen, has been the best Red Bull on the pitch IMO #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Richard Eckersley tries a through ball, but Thierry Henry is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Cass
timelineItems.text: Great early pressure from #RBNY. The #RBA pitch condition definitely reflects NJ's recent weather; snow on the ground up earlier this week.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Henry now in sole possession of the second spot on the all-time #RBNY goalscorer list. 42, one past Gio’s 41. JPA first with 58.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Of note - mins prior, Henry stalked rookie Berner on kickoff and shadowed the SuperDraft pick after - by design #Intimidation #NYvCOL #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Marcelo Barreto
timelineItems.text: Goooooooooooool #RBNY Henry faz o primeiro da temporada http://t.co/VBERUUkq8A

timelineItems.text: Goooooooooooool #RBNY Henry faz o primeiro da temporada http://t.co/VBERUUkq8A

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Also, Torres and Brown need to flip-flop. Torres looks out of place in MF role, Brown lacking killer instinct up top. #Rapids96

timelineItems.text: Chavez on for a disappointing Torres in the 62nd. #Rapids96

timelineItems.text: señor @danielmtl got us good seats ! Next time we are water boys. Go @newyorkredbulls !

timelineItems.text: Steele coming in for Convey. Crowd with a big ovation for their regular starter. #RBNY #MLS #NYvCOL

timelineItems.title: SAVE: John Berner denies Lloyd Sam 1v1

timelineItems.name: Tom Errington
timelineItems.text: Henry's still got it, deserved lead, but could do with more efforts. #RBNY #COLvNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: MJ Waxmonster
timelineItems.text: It's good to be back! Stand up for your boys in white! #rbny #WeWantTheCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids).
Jonathan Steele (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Charles Boehm
timelineItems.text: Chente Sanchez now on for the Rapids. The Uruguayan schemer might be my dark-horse player to watch this year in MLS. #NYvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Thierry Henry with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Aidan O'Donnell
timelineItems.text: #runwithus @newyorkredbulls  @antartarilla

timelineItems.desc: Penalty Colorado Rapids. Marvin Chavez draws a foul in the penalty area against Jamison Olave.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Chavez knocked down from behind by Olave in the box

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Berner dives for Sam’s foot- helping keep ball out of back of the net. Very solid debut for him between the posts. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: Robles and Olave had some WORDS #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Penalty Colorado Rapids. Marvin Chavez draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls) after a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 1, Colorado Rapids 1. Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: PK GOAL: Sanchez perfectly placed PK levels the match

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: PK! RAPIDS! Olave called for bumping Chavez, who made a meal of it. Definitely not a PK in my book. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Gerry Sacco
timelineItems.text: Sad dive... He went down like he was shot. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Marvin Chavez earns a soft PK call. Who wouldn't fall face first walking into Jamison Olave?! #Rapids96 #RBNY #NYvCOL

timelineItems.name: Disgruntled?IslesFan
timelineItems.text: That is a bad call #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Phil Shore
timelineItems.text: That is a terrible PK call against #RBNY Chavez backs into Olave Olave has a right to that space He doesn't push or anything Terrible #MLS

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: Robles guesses right, but that's an extremely well placed PK by Sanchez. #Rapids #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids).
Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Peter Knox
timelineItems.text: Replacement @ml refs make a bad call, unravel the game, and now #rbny is tied when it should never have happened in the 1st place.

timelineItems.name: Abner H. Aceves
timelineItems.text: CHENTEEE! #NYvCOL

timelineItems.name: Jasen Asay
timelineItems.text: Maybe that PK call makes up for Armando's two uncalled fouls that should have been yellow cards. Go #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Roy Miller (New York Red Bulls).
Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Michèle
timelineItems.text: #RBNY always looks so much better when TH is in. Hope someone's starting to think about a succession planning strategy.

timelineItems.name: Rapids Extra Time
timelineItems.text: Equalized! Questionable call in the box against @NewYorkRedBulls . Sanchez puts in the PK. 1-1 (72) #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: TheGoodLife!
timelineItems.text: In on the action. #rbny #executivesubwaycrew #TheGoodLifeFC! �: @timbojbaggins

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: #RBNY fell apart after the second goal against #VWFC last week. Watch for their response after that deflating PK. #Rapids96 #NYvCOL

timelineItems.name: Thor Morgan
timelineItems.text: Soft penalty, but had to be given. Chavez in position for the ball and was knocked off of it. Had no idea Olave was behind #RAPIDS96

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Richard Eckersley.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Great hustle on D by Chavez to prevent a cross, then break up #RBNY attack. He's been at the center of the action since coming on. #Rapids96

timelineItems.desc: Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW: Lloyd Sam brings Deshorn Brown down from behind

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Vicente Sanchez with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: Eric Alexander is getting ready to come in. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: Millionth cross from Sam & Henry heads home. 1-0 #NYRB #MLS

timelineItems.name: bonzimaster
timelineItems.text: #rbny goal scored by #henry 1-0 #rbny over #rapids

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls).
Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Charles Boehm
timelineItems.text: I think Marvin Chavez MAYBE has 2 touches on the ball since coming in but he's changed the game w/ that crafty, crafty PK baiting. #NYvCOL

timelineItems.name: adamjohnstonwpg
timelineItems.text: #TherryHenry and #TimCahill will make the #NYRB go boom or bust in the #MLS Eastern Conference this year.

timelineItems.name: Mandeep Ektakapoor
timelineItems.text: #defendtheshield #rbny #runwithus #petke @riabegum @zombigrind9 @ray0890 @erinvonkupfer @saramonster @omgitsjules @nudels

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Weak call. No doubt in my mind that’s no PK. But can’t tell me a draw wouldn’t be fair reflection of opening 79 minutes. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Phoebe Rowe
timelineItems.text: Can someone tell our back line that tracking is not defending. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Alexander on for Sam, who just earned a yellow card for a professional foul. Sam with another assist, solid day at the office. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Vicente Sanchez following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: A Tie and a Crest
timelineItems.text: It's so nice to have actual depth for a change instead of previous seasons, groaning in agony whenever there was a substitution. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Charles Boehm
timelineItems.text: Wow, Sanchez just got carded for making the 'card him' sign. Ref hewing right to the book in Harrison. #NYvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Today's announced attendance at Red Bull Arena: 20,542. #RBNY

timelineItems.desc: Armando (New York Red Bulls) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW: Armando gets booked for a high elbow

Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Armando (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Luyindula about to check into the match. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Colorado used to be one of the most physical teams in the league. Weird how they keep falling to ground so easily in 2014. #RBNY #Rapids96

timelineItems.text: Armando deserved that a long time ago. #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Attempt missed. Marvin Chavez (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Yellow Armando, who has been flailing today when covering Deshorn Brown. Elbow there, some loose legs earlier #Frustration #NYvCOL #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Tonyd571
timelineItems.text: #RBNY Petke needs to coach to win. Not to not lose

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Eric Alexander (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Thierry Henry.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Luyindula on for Wright-Phillips. BWP active in first start of season, but faded as game wore on. Still enough to earn future starts. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Good stuff from Burch. Been solid for Klute at LB. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: stephanyyy_
timelineItems.text: home opener #redbulls #metrostars #newyork #nyrb #redbullarena

timelineItems.name: just tolstoy
timelineItems.text: Dax needs to tighten up his game too #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: NY suddenly gets very confused about how to attack. Not much time left if they want to find a late winner. #RBNY #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: #NYRB finding lots of space along the wings. #Rapids96 struggling to hold any kind of possession. But still scoreless.

timelineItems.name: porkrollandeggs
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls home opener #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 look like they’re playing for the tie here. Look more concerned with keeping ball than creating chances.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: About 5 fouls back and forth, nothing called, but more time wasting. José Mari down with a toothache. Call the dentist. #RBNY #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: Five mins of added time. Is there a late winner to be had? #RBNY #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Five minutes extra time. Can #RBNY pull something out? Have looked defeated after the PK call. #NYvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match José Mari (Colorado Rapids) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Tim Coyne
timelineItems.text: #RBNY has had one good chance on goal all game. Pretty grim #NYvCOL #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marvin Chavez (Colorado Rapids).
Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Peguy heads it back across the face of goal and nothing happens. Story of the night. #RBNY #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Roy Miller tries a through ball, but Jonathan Steele is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Gerry Sacco
timelineItems.text: I wish Henry could give half his heart to the rest of the team. Disgusted... #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Wild defending here at the end for the #Rapids96.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Eric Alexander (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Armando.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: John Berner is a rookie? Could have fooled me. What a save -- on Henry -- in extra time. #Rapids96 #NYvCOL #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by José Mari.
Attempt saved. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Richard Eckersley with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 nervy defending here. #RBNY throwing everything at them, but coming up short.

timelineItems.name: Phil Shore
timelineItems.text: PK was a bad call & #RBNY dominated possession, but an awful job from the team getting its shots on target. Shooting needs to be much better

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Riddile
timelineItems.text: Stats would show #Rapids96 should be disappointed with a tie, not RBNY. Good opener on the road for @ColoradoRapids.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: And that's game! #RBNY with no answer after the #Rapids96 PK, end match in disappointing 1-1 draw. #NYvCOL #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, New York Red Bulls 1, Colorado Rapids 1.
